attributes.action: Carry out a national one minute silence for the innocent killings of Myanmar.
attributes.additional_details: Myanmar was formerly known as Burma.
attributes.background:
Whether this due to religious hatred or in response to terrorism and extremism, it is claiming the lives of many innocent ones. 

By carrying out a one minute silence, we can counter hatred and deter terrorism by making extremists realise they are indirectly causing the death of innocent people.
